name: Impending Friendship
description:
With 15 minigames, a wide open world to explore, and so many friends (virtual) that you'll actually be sick of them, I bring you: IMPENDING FRIENDSHIP.

Experience a day in the life of Peabody, a free spirit trying to make it in a world of trains and cars, as you meet friend after friend in this exploration life simulator, where you must solve the problems of those around you using INTENSE MINIGAMES that will TEST your METTLE and skills at doing various acts you have only just learned to do.

Try to make it through dodgy trades, philosophical questions, and downright confusing layouts of builds to get lost in, as you hope you can make it through a single tough day for Peabody!

This game is relatively family friendly in nature, featuring cartoon violence but no heavy themes.
